verses.roman:
rūpa kahe,--"kāhāṅ tumi sūryopama bhāsa
muñi kon kṣudra,--yena khadyota-prakāśa

synonyms: rūpa kahe—Rūpa Gosvāmī says; kāhāṅ—where; tumi—you; sūrya-upama—like the sun; bhāsa—brilliance; muñi—I; kon—some; kṣudra—insignificant; yena—exactly like; khadyota-prakāśa—the brilliance of the glowworm.
translation: Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī said, "In your presence, which is just like brilliant sunshine, I am as insignificant as the light of a glowworm.
